message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000. I'm confident you'll recognize its worth!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a great value, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. I'm willing to be flexible, but $9,000 is a significant drop from my initial price.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $9,500?
